name: Yancy Game
description:
Yancy Game is a heavily NES inspired action RPG that follows a small protagonist in an open world full of danger, challenge, swords and rewards.

At the time of writing, the map is a little over 20% populated with content.

The current demo contains a single dungeon, mid way through the game, with  no access to the open world. It equips you with several HP upgrades and a level appropriate weapon.

Arrow keys to move, Z to interact, X to attack, C to heal.

F3 and F4 can be used to resize the game window.

Please leave any feedback in the comments. Enjoy!
